date.source: In the evening of 2 April 2022, during an anti-narcotics operation, the police took the opportunity to enter Room 2110, Hoi Yan House, Hoi Fu Court, Mong Kok (“the Flat”)

time.source: At around 9:20pm, a male and a female appeared on the 21st floor and rang the doorbell of flat 2110

placeOfOffence.address: Room/Flat 2110, 21st floor, Hoi Yan House, Hoi Fu Court, No.2 Hoi Ting Road, Tai Kok Tsui, Kowloon
placeOfOffence.source: Particulars of the offence: on 2 April 2022, at room 2110, 21st floor, Hoi Yan House, Hoi Fu Court, No.2 Hoi Ting Road, Tai Kok Tsui, Kowloon

natureOfPlaceOfOffence.source: Hoi Yan House is a public housing estate, with the defendant as the registered tenant of flat 2110

traffickingMode.source: The paraphernalia of the trafficker were found inside the premises, namely two different types of dangerous drugs contained in smaller re-sealable bags of drugs, multiple empty re-sealable plastic bags and an electronic scale...that people would come to the flat to consume or receive drugs

reason_for_offence.source: The defendant claimed under caution that the “pork” and “weed” were for his own consumption, and he would sometimes share them with his friends; mitigation: the pain drove the defendant to resort to dangerous drugs
